pizzaShop.controller

Class CatalogController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pizzaShop.controller.CatalogController

  • @Controller
public class CatalogController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller to create the Catalog View
    Author:
    Florentin

public java.lang.String showCatalog(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        on /catalog the itemCatalog is shown

      • removeItem

        @RequestMapping(value="/removeItem")
public java.lang.String removeItem(@RequestParam(value="pid")
                                                                         org.salespointframework.catalog.ProductIdentifier id)
        on /remove a given item will be reomved from the catalog
        Parameters:
        id - the productidentifier of the item which will be removed
        Returns:
        redirects to the catalog template

      • saveItem

        @RequestMapping(value="/saveItem")
public java.lang.String saveItem(@RequestParam(value="pid")
                                                                     org.salespointframework.catalog.ProductIdentifier id,
                                                                     @RequestParam(value="itemname")
                                                                     java.lang.String name,
                                                                     @RequestParam(value="itemprice")
                                                                     java.lang.Number price,
                                                                     @RequestParam(value="itemtype")
                                                                     java.lang.String type)
        when item is edited the new item will be saved in the itemCatalog
        Parameters:
        id - productidentifier of item which shall be altered
        name - new name of the item (not empty)
        price - new price of the item (greater or equal 0)
        type - new type of the item
        Returns:
        redirects to the catalog page

      • editItem

        @RequestMapping(value="/editItem")
public java.lang.String editItem(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                     @RequestParam(value="pid")
                                                                     org.salespointframework.catalog.ProductIdentifier id)
        directs to the addItem template with an optional Item searched by the parameter id
        Parameters:
        model - model for the addItem template
        id - the id of the item to be edited
        Returns:
        directs to the addItem template

      • addItem

        @RequestMapping(value="addItem")
public java.lang.String addItem(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        adds an error variabel to the model (to catch errors)
        Parameters:
        model - for generating the addItem template
        Returns:
        directs to the addItem template

      • createItem

        @RequestMapping(value="/createItem")
public java.lang.String createItem(@RequestParam(value="itemname")
                                                                         java.lang.String name,
                                                                         @RequestParam(value="itemprice")
                                                                         java.lang.Number price,
                                                                         @RequestParam(value="itemtype")
                                                                         java.lang.String type)
        checks if the inputs are valid and creates an new item and adds it the itemCatalog
        Parameters:
        name - name of the new item (not empty)
        price - price of the new item (greater or equal 0)
        type - ItemType of the new item
        Returns:
        redirects to the catalog template if successfull otherwise to the addItem template with error description
